text: In this life we are running and running.
And we are running in an autonomous mode.
We have been doing the same thing for years. We have been thinking the same thing for years. Isn't it?
Our mind and body are so adopted to the existing pattern that it is almost impossible to change a part of the pattern.
This will make you less satisfied in your life which will lead to depression.
We cannot change our lifestyle entirely. But with a bit of dedication we can change a small part of it.
I have a set of simple natural tasks that will bring you close to the nature, gives you self satisfaction.
By doing the task you will contribute for a better society and environment as well.
Basically you will do a small task each day. Are you ready to start today itself?
Great, today we will start with planting a tree. Very simple right? Not too much of work is required.
Basically you can start with any plant and a pot if you don't have a garden.
It is recommended to start with a fruit plant or flower plant. Because It gives you immense pleasure when tree produces fruit or flower.
I am going to show you a Youtube video to get some inspiration.
That's all for today. Please do the task today. See you tomorrow. Bye!
Great. I am glad that you finally did something different. It was no easy to change the pattern.
You did a wonderful job!
Today we are going to bring a wonderful living being to your home.
Today we are going to bring a wonderful living being to your home.
A bird
Natural soothing sound of bird calms our mind and makes you productive.
It doesn't cost you much to pet a bird.
Taking care of birds makes you responsible in your life.
Natural chirping sound make you feel like you are living with nature.
I am going to suggest you a Youtube video to get some inspiration.
That's all for today. Please pet a bird today. Don't forget to water your plant. See you tomorrow. Bye!
Wow. Nice to see you again. How is your bird doing? How is your plant growing? Write in the comment section.
You are doing a wonderful job!
We got so many things from society when we are growing up right?
But we forgot to give it back.
We can do so many thing without spending much money. But we all can spend few hours.
There can be a number of things we can do. Today I am going to suggest one.
We can teach young children how to solve Math Problems or some Science stuff.
Believe me you will love it. This will make you recall your childhood moments. And that was Awesome right?
If you have young children in your relative then start with that. That is easy.
I am going to suggest you a Youtube video to get some inspiration.
Here is another video that will love to learn.
That's all for today. Don't forget to feed your pet and water your plant. See you tomorrow. Bye!
